data.title: Rafael Araujo Bio and Information
data.meta_description:
Recently graduated BYU All-American center Rafael Araujo is projected as a first-round pick in the upcoming NBA Draft on June 24.
Included below are links to a complete player profile and related news articles on Araujo. The PDF version (select link above) provides a printable full bio that also includes his senior season's game-by-game statistics.
Rafael Araujo Player Profile
Rafael Araujo Questions & Answers
Related Articles
data.text:
Recently graduated BYU All-American center Rafael Araujo is projected as a first-round pick in the upcoming NBA Draft on June 24.

Included below are links to a complete player profile and related news articles on Araujo. The PDF version (select link above) provides a printable full bio that also includes his senior season's game-by-game statistics.

Rafael Araujo Player Profile

Rafael Araujo Questions & Answers
